page.title: 07Kidsgrove Fire Station
page.content: Kidsgrove Fire Station is today manned and has two fire engines called appliances.They also have a water tanker and a van.They have a tower in the yard which is used for training,and for drying hoses.They have got four large appliance bayes for the vehicles. They have got a social club upstairs and downstairs they have offices and storerooms.They sometimes have open days when they show you around and let you climb over the appliances.At night the station is unmanned but the firemen have bleepers to warn them when there is a fire or something like that.You are'nt at work or when it is night time.The fire station is fairly new and so are the fire engines one of them is "X" registered.
